name: darks-tories-functions
description: Firebase Cloud Functions for Dark Stories API

scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.seed: npm run build && FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8081 GCLOUD_PROJECT=dark-stories-ai-7f82e node lib/scripts/seedStories.js
scripts.seed:force: npm run build && FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8081 GCLOUD_PROJECT=dark-stories-ai-7f82e node lib/scripts/seedStories.js --force
